text.name: toolTip_simpleInspector_Visible
text.text: When enabled, the overlay is visible

text.name: toolTip_simpleInspector_TextSize
text.text: Font Size for display, in relative pixels.

text.name: toolTip_simpleInspector_AlphaSort
text.text: When enabled, sort list alphebetically, otherwise, use the tab order.

text.name: toolTip_simpleInspector_ShowAll
text.text: When enabled, show all vehicles. When disabled, limit to running vehicles, those controlled by AI, or occupied by a player

text.name: toolTip_simpleInspector_ShowUnowned
text.text: When enabled, show vehicles from farms you are not a part of. This has no effect in single player.

text.name: toolTip_simpleInspector_ShowPlayer
text.text: When enabled, show the name of the player controlling a vehicle. Active in multiplayer games only.

text.name: toolTip_simpleInspector_ShowFillPercent
text.text: When enabled, show a percentage along with the fill level of a vehicle or implement

text.name: toolTip_simpleInspector_ShowFuel
text.text: When enabled, show the fuel level and type of fuel in vehicles

text.name: toolTip_simpleInspector_ShowSpeed
text.text: When enabled, show the speed of vehicles

text.name: toolTip_simpleInspector_ShowFills
text.text: When enabled, show the fill level of vehicles and their implements

text.name: toolTip_simpleInspector_ShowField
text.text: When enabled, show a marker if a vehicle is on a field

text.name: toolTip_simpleInspector_ShowFieldNum
text.text: When enabled, show the number of the field a vehicle is on, if known

text.name: toolTip_simpleInspector_PadFieldNum
text.text: When enabled, show the field number as at least 2 digits (1 -> 01)

text.name: toolTip_simpleInspector_ShowDamage
text.text: When enabled, show a marker when vehicle hits the damage threshold (20% remaining / 80% damaged)

text.name: toolTip_simpleInspector_ShowCPWaypoints
text.text: When enabled, show the current and total number of waypoints when CoursePlay controls a vehicle.

text.name: toolTip_simpleInspector_TextBold
text.text: When enabled, use bold text throughout the display
